name: Defense of the Phasers
description:
This is a tower defense game that is built for GameDev.tv Jam 2021. Game features random path and waves. There is no winning the game, you can either give up or loose. Game has an acceptable balance. We require more feedback to improve the balancing.

There is in game help available from the main menu. The game requires full HD resolution, at least for now. There are no sounds.

Uses clean and nice graphics that are donated by Kenney to public domain.

This game uses Gorgon Game Engine.

Game source code can be accessed from GitHub.

Linux executable requires FreeType2, Flac, and Vorbis libraries installed.
